briefTitle: Study of Safety and Efficacy of a rhPTH[1-84] of Fixed Doses of 25 and 50 mcg in Adults With Hypoparathyroidism (RELAY)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Dose-blinded Study to Investigate the Safety and Efficacy of NPSP558, a Recombinant Human Parathyroid Hormone [rhPTH(1-84)], at Fixed Doses of 25 µg and 50 µg for the Treatment of Adults With Hypoparathyroidism
summary: Use of PTH (1-84) a recombinant hormone in 25 µg or 50 µg doses for the treatment of adults with hypoparathyroidism. The use of PTH (1-84) should result in a decrease of calcium and vitamin D supplements.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects Who Achieved the Primary Triple Endpoint at Week 8, Based on Investigator Prescribed Data.
